tagline: A extremely light MVC framework built in Haxe.
name: BareBones MVC
body:
### Welcome to BBMVC.
An extreamly light MVC framework that is written in Haxe that you can use for your Actionscript, and other cross platform Haxe projects.

### Actionscript Example
If you would like to use BBMVC in your Flex or Actionscript projects it's pretty simple. I've provided an  [Actionscript example ](https://github.com/matthewswallace/BBMVCExampleProject.git) to help you get started. 

After you have grabbed the source code for BBMVC you will want to grab the bbmvc.swc out of the build directory and drop it into your project in order for it to work.
